tag_list: wedding-photographer-christchurch, nzipp, aipa, new-zealand-photographer, dean-norrie, star-photographers, dean-norrie-photographer
overview:
International Award Winning Photographer Dean Norrie studied Professional Photography at Photo Access in Christchurch, New Zealand 18 years ago, since then his work has taken him all around the world, working in England, the U.S, Australia and other far reaches of the world, shooting Wedding, Fashion and Portraiture, winning awards for his Portraiture in 2002 at (Venture Lifestyle Studios, England) moving back to his mother country New Zealand in 2006 starting his business, Star Photographers Ltd. Dean specializes in Innovative Social Photography (anything to do with people) preferring to shoot weddings in a photojournalism style, creating fresh, less-formal, candid images, to capture all the beautiful moments telling a true love story. “Capturing the spirit of life in every image”.

Christchurch photographer Dean Norrie brings a relaxed and unobtrusive approach to Wedding Photography.

“I endeavour to capture the essence of love and happiness on your wedding day by shooting spontaneous, less-formal candid images,” he says.

“Family and friends are just as important as the couple getting married, so I also photograph everyone having fun on your special day; paying close attention to all the finer details creating a beautiful photographic record for the couple to treasure for life.”

Dean’s artistic professionalism, refined technical ability and relaxed style of taking photos will excite you, He will maximize your time and creativity breathing life into your images that will last a life time and won’t cost the earth, offering Wedding Photography Packages from $1200

Painter of Light, Norrie is a Qualified Wedding Professional Member of the New Zealand Institute of Professional Photographers Weddings FREE PHONE: 0800 174 686 www.deannorrie.com

image.attribution: Christchurch Photographer Dean Norrie is NZIPP & AIPA Qualified
